title: Down to the final 11 - WTB The Following T205s
author: Tcards-Please

posts.post_title: Down to the final 11 - WTB The Following T205s
posts.post_content:
After seeing my wife start and almost finish her FIRST ever sports card set within 6 months, I would like to finish my set that I started almost 6 years ago.  It is amazing how quickly one can finish something if they stay completely focused.  She started collecting the 2012 Topps Pink Breast Cancer Awareness Football set this past August and is down to needing 3 cards.  I thought it would have taken her longer to complete, but I've got to give it to her, she stayed focused and has done a fantastic job getting to where she is today with that.

My resolution is for me to finish my T205 set that I started in 2007.  I am on the final stretch and need 11 cards to complete my set.  I'm looking for the following cards in Good condition (SGC 30) range.  Would prefer to buy in a lot.  Let me know what you have.


Josh Devore
Richard Egan
Richard Hoblitzell - no stats (should someone have one lying around)
Thomas Jones
John Kling
Ambrose McConnell
John McLean
Michael Mitchell
George Moriarity
George Mullin
Charles Schmidt

r/
Frank
Frank, I have these 2.  Pm me with an offer if you're interested.  Theres a couple small/light wrinkles on left of the Phelps and the Kroh appears wrinkle/crease free.  Good luck.

Steve,
Thanks for responding.  I am interested and a PM was sent for payment info.

r/
Frank

Hi Frank,

Have a Leever SGC 30 if you still need it.  PM me if you're interested.

Have Leach, Maddox and Phillippe as well if you're willing to go SGC 40 or PSA 2/3.

--
Mike

Mike,
PM sent.  I'm interested in all 4.  Let me know what you are looking to get.

r/
Frank

Steven,

Kroh & Phelps arrived today.  Thank you for the flawless transaction and helping me complete this set.

r/
Frank

Although I literally just received it in the mail 24 hours ago ..... if it will help a fellow collector complete a set it's worth giving it up ...

Pryor McElveen SGC 30.

feel free to pm me if you still need it.

Steve,

PM sent.  Thanks for responding.  I am in need of him for my set.  Let me know what you want and I can send payment paypal or check this evening.

r/
Frank
